name: Dinosaur / Dragon Hat, Newborn to Teen, Great Photo Prop, Choose your size and colours
description:
This adorable little dinosaur hat is made with soft 100% acrylic yarn. Perfect for adding a simple touch to your little one’s outfit or photo shoot. 

You choose the size and colours you would like. How about a pink dinosaur with purple spots?. Put your imagination to the test, just let me know when you order what colour options you have chosen. Please view my colour chart for available colours. 

Size Chart:
Newborn to 3 months – 12”-14” head circumference
3-6 months – 14” - 17” head circumference
6 to 12 months – 17” - 19” head circumference
1 year - 4/5T - 19" - 21" head circumference

Please do not forget to specify the size & colors you want at checkout. 

Items should be gently handwashed with a mild detergent and layed flat to dry. Heavy washing or wringing will cause the items to loose their shape.

Items are made to order, so please allow 5 business days to create your item before it is shipped out. 

Thanks to www.monkeyshinedesigns2.etsy.com for the beautiful pattern.

**Colors may vary slightly due to difference in monitors.

name: Cute Fringed Ear Owl Hat, Choose your size and colour, Photography Prop
description:
This adorable Fringed Ear Owl Hat is made with soft 100% acrylic yarn. Perfect for adding a simple touch to your little one’s outfit or photo shoot. The braided ties can be placed in a bow or left hanging loose for a different look. Super Cute either way.

Size Chart:

Newborn – 13-14”
3-6 Months – 14-17”
6-12 Months – 16-19”
Toddler, 12 Months – 3 Years – 18-20”
Child, 3 to 10 Years – 19-20.5”
Teen to adult – 20.5-22”

Please do not forget to specify the size you need at checkout. 

Items should be gently handwashed with a mild detergent and layed flat to dry. Heavy washing or wringing will cause the items to loose their shape.

Items are made to order, so please allow 5 business days to create your item before it is shipped out.

**Colors may vary slightly due to difference in monitors.

name: White Scalloped Baby Beanie Hat with 5 detachable flowers. Great photography prop or baby shower gif
description:
This adorable scalloped edged Beanie Hat is made with soft 100% acrylic yarn in a beautiful textured pattern. Perfect for adding a simple touch to your little one’s outfit or photo shoot. 

The hat comes in white with five interchangable flowers of your colour choice, please see my colour chart for flower colour options.

Size Chart:

0 to 6 months – 15” x 6”
6 to 12 months – 17” x 7”
12 months to 3 years – 18” x 7 ½”
3 to 10 years – 19” x 8”
Preteen to Adult – 21” x 8 ½”

Please do not forget to specify the size & colors you need at checkout. 

If you would like the hat in another colour, please convo me.

Items should be gently handwashed with a mild detergent and layed flat to dry. Heavy washing or wringing will cause the items to loose their shape.

Items are made to order, so please allow 5 business days to create your item before it is shipped out. 

Thanks to Speckledfrogcrochet www.speckledfrogcrochet.etsy.com for the beautiful pattern.

**Colors may vary slightly due to difference in monitors.

name: Sock Monkey Beanie Hat with earflaps, Choose your size and colour, Photography Prop
description:
This adorable Sock Monkey Hat is made with white, pink, black and a tweed coloured yarn with a great big pom-pom on top. Perfect for adding a simple touch to your little one’s outfit or photo shoot. 

Choose your own accent colour in place of the pink. See my colour chart for options.

The beautiful braided ties can be tied in a bow or left hanging loose for different looks in your photos.


Size Chart:
Newborn to 6 months - 14-16”
6 to 12 months - 16-18”
1 to 2 years – 18 - 19.5”
2 to 4 years – 19.5 – 21”
4 years and older – 21.5”

Please do not forget to specify the size and colour you need at checkout. 

Items should be gently handwashed with a mild detergent and layed flat to dry. Heavy washing or wringing will cause the items to loose their shape.

Items are made to order, so please allow 5 business days to create your item before it is shipped out. 

Thanks to www.sweetkiwicrochet.etsy.com for the beautiful pattern.

**Colors may vary slightly due to difference in monitors.

name: Newborn to 5 years, Frog Earflap Beanie hat, great photography prop
description:
This adorable frog earflap beanie hat is made with soft 100% acrylic yarn with stuffed beady little eyes. Perfect for adding a simple touch to your baby boy or girl's outfit or photo shoot. 

Size Chart:
Newborn: 12" - 14.5" head circumference
3-6 month: 14" - 17" head circumference
6-12 month: 17" - 19" head circumference
Up to 5 years: approx 20.5" head circumference

Please do not forget to specify the size you need at checkout. 

Items should be gently handwashed with a mild detergent and layed flat to dry. Heavy washing or wringing will cause the items to loose their shape.

Items are made to order, so please allow 5 business days to create your item before it is shipped out.
